Key Match Events: Trey Sweeney had four hits, including a home run, and Ty Madden struck out seven in the Detroit Tigers' 9-1 win over the Oakland Athletics.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Detroit Tigers beat the Oakland Athletics 9-1 on Sunday.
The game was played at Oakland Coliseum in Oakland, California, with an attendance of 11,250.
Others: Ty Madden pitched 5.0 IP, 5 H, 1 ER, 7 K, 1 BB for the Tigers.
J.T. Ginn pitched 5.0 IP, 7 H, 3 ER, 5 K, 1 BB for the Athletics.
